summary: The module implements a full training pipeline for a text‑to‑image diffusion model (Stable Diffusion). It parses command‑line arguments, loads and preprocesses a captioned image dataset, tokenizes captions, constructs the VAE, UNet and text encoder components, configures optimizers, schedulers and EMA, runs a distributed training loop with optional validation image generation, saves checkpoints, and optionally creates and uploads a model card to the Hugging Face Hub.
business_intent: Offer a ready‑to‑use reference script that enables developers and researchers to fine‑tune or train their own Stable Diffusion models on custom data, accelerating the creation of proprietary generative image solutions.
